page.title: 15ARTS & CRAFTS IN MARSHFIELD
page.content: There is much hidden talent. There are skilled potters (1 professional), 3 jewel makers and an expert enameller. Woodworkers include guitar maker, joiner, fence maker, cabinet maker and picture framer. There is a small studio for bronze sculpturing, employing skilled workers, and a caner/upholsterer of chairs. Textile crafts include dressmakers, spinners dyeing wool with natural dyes, a designer and knitter of model jumpers, fabric and batik printers. Many make hassocks for the church, and do tapestry, embroidery and patchwork. There is a restorer of oriental carpets who employs skilled workers. There are many who paint in water colour or oils, a professional landscape artist and 2 signwriters. Cake decorators and flower arrangers also flourish.WI run a weekly market.
